Acceptance Criteria:

I can update the company's verification file, agreement file and address only.
Dependency: 
Registered company admin should be login to the admin panel.  

Steps: 
Open postman
Open Folder (Field Force Management)
Open a new tab 
Add API URL
Select body, Select "raw"
Paste payload in the body.
Select method: PUT
Select the Authorization tab
Select type: Bearer Token
Paste the token: ("Dashboard User login" API)
Hit the "Send" button to execute the API

API Specification: 
API URL: /api/v1/field-force/users/superadmin/company/update/{company_id}
Method: PUT

(Note: For company_id as a registered Super admin you can get it from "Superadmin Company List" API.)

Body:
{
"address":"Dhanmondhi,Dhaka",
